text: Stefan Schmid (born 6 July 1970 in Würzburg) is a German decathlete. His personal best result was 8485 points, achieved in July 2000 in Ratingen. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="5"|Representing |- |1991 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |9th |7779 pts |- |rowspan=2|1994 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |bgcolor="cc9966" | 3rd |8201 pts |- |European Championships |Helsinki, Finland | 5th |8109 pts |- |1997 |World Championships |Athens, Greece |7th |8360 pts |- |1998 |European Championships |Budapest, Hungary | 14th |8011 pts |- |rowspan=2|2000 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |8th |8445 pts |- |Olympic Games |Sydney, Australia |9th |8206 pts |- |2001 |World Championships |Edmonton, Canada |align="center" | 7th |8307 pts |} ==References== * *Profile Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:German decathletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Germany
title: Stefan Schmid
